TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IButtonControl

summary.span: 允許控制項在表單中有和按鈕相同的作用。

span.span: Allows a control to act like a button on a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值和 [取消] 按鈕的處理，可能會實作這個介面的範例。An example of where this interface might be implemented is default and cancel button processing. 未處理的 ENTER 鍵輸入表單中，就像會關閉對話方塊時，會收到通知的預設按鈕。Default buttons are notified when an unprocessed ENTER key is entered for a form, just like a dialog box would be closed. 同樣地中, [取消] 按鈕會收到通知，未處理的 ESC 鍵進入時在表單上，更像是會關閉對話方塊。Similarly, cancel buttons are notified whenever an unprocessed ESC key is entered on a form, much like a dialog box would be dismissed. ## Examples 下列範例會繼承類別並實作介面。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 實作會加入至屬性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

span.para: 做為按鈕控制項的類別中實作這個介面。此介面的成員會提供基本按鈕的功能，例如提供父表單或執行的能力事件或做為預設按鈕的表單。

Implement this interface in classes that act as button controls. The members of this interface will provide basic button functionality, such as providing a to the parent form or the ability to perform a event, or acting as the default button of a form.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult DialogResult { System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult value); };
member this.DialogResult : System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定當按下按鈕時傳回父表單的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value returned to the parent form when the button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單會顯示為對話方塊方塊中，使用方法，以及其中一個其按鈕按下時，按鈕的的值指派給表單的屬性。When a form is shown as a dialog box using the method and one of its buttons is clicked, the button's value is assigned to the form's property. ## Examples 下列範例會繼承類別並實作介面。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 實作會加入至屬性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

param.name: value
param.span: 如果控制項應該做為預設按鈕，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control should behave as a default button; otherwise .

summary.span: 告知控制項其為預設按鈕，使其外觀和行為能做適當的調整。

span.span: Notifies a control that it is the default button so that its appearance and behavior is adjusted accordingly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要讓控制項的預設按鈕的父表單會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by a parent form to make a control the default button. 具有特粗的框線為預設按鈕。Default buttons are set to have an extra thick border. ## Examples 下列範例會繼承類別並實作介面。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 實作會加入至屬性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformClick() cil managed

summary.span: 產生控制項的 事件。

span.span: Generates a event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會取得焦點時，按鈕或 [預設] 按鈕 （如果沒有其他按鈕具有焦點） 時使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。This method is called for the button that has focus, or for the default button (if no other button has focus) when the user presses the ENTER key. 當使用者按下 ESC 鍵，如果按鈕設定為 [取消] 按鈕時，也會呼叫這個方法。This method is also called when the user presses the ESC key if the button is set as the cancel button. ## Examples 下列範例會繼承類別並實作介面。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 實作會加入至屬性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]
